occupation: Co Founder - Chief Technology Officer at PINA Indonesia
headline: Co-Founder & CTO at PINA (YC w22) - Hiring  Lead / Senior Backend Developer
summary:
Every brand has stories to tell—stories that will not only engage, inform, surprise, delight, and impact their audience, but that will also deliver on measurable business goals. And I am the conduit between brand and consumer.

I have a clear, logical mind with a practical approach to problem solving and a drive to see things through to completion. I enjoy working on my own initiative or in a team.

An expert in digital innovation and transformation with exposure across a wide area of business including technology, project delivery management, and change management in the digital field.

Active researcher on Complex Programming, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, & Big Data Technology. My range of skills also including a variety of technical skillsets on server side technologies such as Java, PHP, & Bash, combined with front-end technologies such as NodeJs, React, HTML5 and CSS, and a variety of different frameworks and CMS (Laravel, AEM, Drupal, Magento, Codeigniter, Joomla, Concrete5, and Wordpress). I've also worked with third party API's such as Salesforce, Gigya, Facebook, Twitter and Google.

experiences.title: Co Founder - Chief Technology Officer
experiences.description: At PINA, we are designing and building the future of personal finance with a mission to help everyone achieve financial freedom by providing products and advice that make complicated financial decisions simple and relevant. Empowering people to invest smarter through personalized expert advice and powerful online investing and money management tools.

experiences.title: Director Of Operations & Technology
experiences.description:
Lead technology, projects management, and operations department, as well as improve cross-functional department workflow and communications.

Drive change in conventional agency way of work to adopt agile and continous-improvement principle. Take a continuous approach to planning, forecasting, estimating, managing uncertainty, metrics and measurements, contingency planning and roadmapping. Communicate the plan, planning assumptions and progress to a range of stakeholders.

Leading the operational area during the merging between Mirum, JWT, & Wunderman Indonesia to become single functional agency as Wunderman Thompson. Streamlining agency process and driving efficiency are the main objective.

Perform agency resource planning, utilisation, budget, and build agency standard operating procedure to drive efficiency & profitability. Including the agency projects implementation planning. roadmaps, implementation, & evaluation.

experiences.title: Director, Project Consultancy & Technology
experiences.description:
Grow the business - grow the relationship - grow the team - deliver the best of the service - dive on technology and build it.
Introduce Growth Hacking approach as one of agency offering for marketing/commerce type clients.
Driving a culture of brand thinking and consumer understanding through Human Centred Design approach.
A business leader who is inspire best practice, state-of-the-art techniques and technological innovation across enterprise, consumer applications and experiences implementation.

experiences.title: Technical Lead
experiences.description:
•	Ensure teams follow the correct procedures, policies and documentation requirements across project phases
•	Guide the team through the development, testing and implementation stages and review the completed work effectively
•	Provide direction and technical expertise in design, development and systems integration
•	Able to make quick decisions and solve technical problems to provide an efficient environment for project implementation
•	Identify resource and equipment requirements, efficient capacity planning and manage software and hardware availability
•	Provide technical training to teams when required and serve as a technical mentor to team members
•	Served as a core group member in defining and prioritizing technology investments for short and long terms, ensuring the alignment of process, technology and business objectives.
•	Led, architected and participated in the design, testing and deployment of mobile, desktop, and web application.
•	Ensure standard operating procedures and project guidelines are in place
•	Task allocation and performance evaluation of team members
•	Project scheduling and resource management
•	Planning, budgeting and reporting on projects [Tip:  Take this introductory course to learn effective project management]
•	Make presentations on project status, present monthly and annual reports to senior management
•	Meet with client teams and gather requirements, conduct regular team meetings and track project progress
•	Interview candidates and hire resources
•	Conduct performance reviews of team members and identify areas of improvement, give feedback and recommend for promotions or salary increments
•	Estimate project budgets cost-effective way
•	Provide an efficient working atmosphere to project teams and ensure objectives are met within stipulated time

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description:
•	Research and develop responsive web application, on more than 20 desktop and mobile devices platform.
•	Research and develop IOs and Android application. 
•	Research on mobile application project development process, management, and post service.
•	Research on Agile and Scrum project management.
•	Research and develop on javascript boilerplate web app platform.

experiences.title: Independent Consultant
experiences.description:
•	Conduct web search evaluation using an Excel spreadsheet and annotation tool.
•	Review and rate web content associated with specific search queries, using a web application to support the measurement of search data relevance.
•	Evaluate online search results according to detailed criteria.
•	Data Transcription.

recommendations:
Eldini Hilman



Fajar is a very wise and down to earth person, which are only a few of reasons why people love working with him. He focuses on solution, and analyzes problems really well at the same time to avoid the same thing to ever happen again.

Technology is not his only expertise, he is also an excellent project management person that can determine the right work flow to help us do our job more effectively. 

Being a tech guy, doesn’t make him hard to approach. In fact, he is a true leader that genuinely cares about his subordinates. He sees the positive side of people and brings the best of them with his mentoring style. 

It was a wonderful years working with Fajar, will definitely do it again if we have the chance.

Daniel Riyardi Angga Kusuma



I never surprise to see him reaching point at he is now. He's a perfect example of person who lead by example. Giving results instead of nonsense-clueless outcomes. He worked in silent, but we all could witnessed and felt of his meteoric-rising career is not coming out of nothing. His results speak for itself. We all can rely on him by the time the technical glitch was coming, and he never refused to give his best efforts helping us on that. Additionally, his humble and polite persona are becoming key points of making him a wonderful, talented, kind-hearted, smart-hardworking fella. It's been honour to get to know you broh..cheers..!

Cenmi Mulyanto



Fajar is an individual that constantly reminds me that there are smart people, then there are higher levels of intelligence that people like Fajar posses. He has a deep and expansive knowledge in tech in addition to having a no non-sense and solution oriented way in project management. But above all that his greatest asset is his empathy. With it he is able to identify problems and solution that other people might not realise.

Jofardhan Faruq



Fajar is a person who can be a good leader at work and a great friend outside. His technical ability is undoubtedly, supported with his creative thinking always bring an insightful solution. It always a pleasure to be on the same team with him.
